browser-action.name: DoubleClick on default
browser-action.description:
Click a selector.
Possible parameters are: - selector (required): The selector is a string that point to the elements in the page. Several types of selector are supported: Text, CSS, XPath... - force (optional): Forces the click, even if the target element is obscured by other elements - mouseButton (optional): LEFT, MIDDLE or RIGHT. Default to LEFT. - doubleClick (optional): Peforms a double click. Default value is "false". - modifiers (optional): Modifier keys to press separated by "+" like Control+Shift. - waitForNavigation (optional): Waits for the frame navigation. Default value is "false". - timeout (optional): Forces the timeout for that action in ms. - frameName (optional): Frame name
